description: This file contains Pydantic schema models for the Todo API, defining request and response data structures used in API endpoints.

classes.name: TodoBase
classes.description: Base schema for Todo with common fields

classes.name: TodoCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new todo item

classes.name: TodoUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating an existing todo item with optional fields for partial updates

classes.name: TodoComplete
classes.description: Schema for marking a todo as complete or incomplete

classes.name: TodoResponse
classes.description: Schema for todo response, including system-generated fields like id and timestamps

classes.name: TodoListResponse
classes.description: Schema for list of todos response

ctags.name: Config
ctags.pattern: /^    class Config:$/

ctags.name: ErrorResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ErrorResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TodoBase
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoBase(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TodoComplete
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoComplete(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TodoCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoCreate(TodoBase):$/

ctags.name: TodoListResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoListResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TodoResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoResponse(TodoBase):$/

ctags.name: TodoUpdate
ctags.pattern: /^class TodoUpdate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: completed
ctags.pattern: /^    completed: Optional[bool] = Field(None, description="Whether the todo is completed")$/

ctags.name: completed
ctags.pattern: /^    completed: bool = Field(..., description="Whether the todo is completed")$/

ctags.name: completed
ctags.pattern: /^    completed: bool = Field(default=False, description="Whether the todo is completed")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: str = Field(..., description="When the todo was created")$/

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Description of the todo item", max_len/

ctags.name: description
ctags.pattern: /^    description: Optional[str] = Field(default="", description="Description of the todo item", m/

ctags.name: detail
ctags.pattern: /^    detail: str = Field(..., description="Error message")$/

ctags.name: from_attributes
ctags.pattern: /^        from_attributes = True$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for the todo")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Title of the todo item", min_length=1, max_l/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: str = Field(..., description="Title of the todo item", min_length=1, max_length=500)$/

ctags.name: todos
ctags.pattern: /^    todos: list[TodoResponse] = Field(default=[], description="List of todo items")$/

ctags.name: total
ctags.pattern: /^    total: int = Field(..., description="Total count of todos")$/

ctags.name: updated_at
ctags.pattern: /^    updated_at: str = Field(..., description="When the todo was last updated")$/
